2.0.4.name: wordpress/super-capcha
2.0.4.description:
THE VERY FIRST (AND CURRENTLY, ONLY!!!) 3-D CAPTCHA FOR WORDPRESS! What makes this diffrent from other CAPTCHA's you ask? Our CAPTCHA forces the viewer to use the power of deduction to know what the CAPTCHA says. Our CAPTCHA is not struggling to "distort" the image more to keep it out of the OCR reader's tolerances, we're so far ahead of OCR software, OCR companies USE OUR CAPTCHA as a standard to break. We use a revolutionary method of printing a clear/transparent font and laying lines over the top of it. This causes a human brain to instantly see letters because they can see what is missing through deduction and reasoning, where as a computer, incapable of reasoning or deduction cannot make sense of the lines.

When we sparked the idea of this software, we were like you -- we had tried using every CAPTCHA out there including Google's reCAPTCHA to no end and no real results. We then started with a 2-D CAPTCHA that let each site customize its own type of CAPTCHA making
